11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
06.02.2009 GB SCR14368 Replaced 'F2'Kbd by RaiseEvent = Cancel
03.03.2008 SH SCR9302 Reduced argument list of GM100
28.07.2006 SH SCR11628 Added test CHQE_DATEMONEYRECEIVED = null
to parts where chques could be added; Added test that already added cheques
are not selected if button "Add cheques" is pressed again
04.07.2006 AK Temporary change for test only - everything is changed back again
05-11-2003 JP request JDO: wrong column headtext in online task
22.04.2003 SH SCR3392 Moved text for totals a bit to left to get more space for
- translations
26.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
30.01.2003 SCR1793 SH/RR Add argument to GM100 (see SPECS)
-- SCR#729 --> 04.02.2002 SH ( Function 'Scanned cheques' added)
-- SCR#755 --> 05.02.2002 SH (Made screen wider)
-- only Querymode, when the parent program OPH101C called from OPH106C
What To Do:
W: Write CHQUE ID's from CHQE_UNIT
O: Call Online Task for overview
D:Delete CHQE-row
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- Delete cheques
-- Add cheques from the selected cheque unit to BDPC
-- Task 'Online' will be opened in CREATE MODE if there are no records
-- in range. Most of the functions are disabled then. It's not allowed
-- to create a new row in this task, it's opened in CREATE MODE only
-- to show an empty table.
-- see remark in R.S.
-- Leave program after pressing Key 'Esc' or Button 'Cancel' or
-- directly called an other program from the menue
-- Ask for confirmation, if User pressed key 'Esc' or call directly an
-- other program from the menue
OK-button has been pushed
-- If there is only one cheque unit --> see Range, all cheques from
the cheque unit added to the BANKACCOUNT_DAILY_PAYMENT_CHAD
If there are more cheque units, a selection tabel is opened
Already added cheques have to be skipped (see LinkQuery on BDPC and RangeExp)
when there's only one record in CHQE_UNIT: exit automatic, call task
"Write cheques" via "Get Next Number" and write CHQE_ID's
belonging to this Unit in BDPC
-- No Cheque units exists
-- More than one cheque units exists, Call --> Selectionscreen
-- Only when one cheque unit exists
- Already added cheques have to be skipped (see LinkQuery on BDPC and RangeExp)

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OPH101C2A]: Outstanding cheque units for this bank')

Text.val: OK or ENTER pressed
-- Delete
-- Abort Delete
-- Add all cheques from the selected cheque unit to the
-- BANKACCOUNT_DAILY_PAYMENT_CHAD
